name: Curls Nurture Cream~ 4oz.
description:
This product works effectively for curly styles. It brings out your natural curl definition while moisturizing your hair. This product provides low to medium hold to your curly styles. This is not a curl definer product, as in it will not create curl that does not exist in your hair. For non-curly hair, you can twist the hair using this product to achieve the looks you want. I’ve used this product for my twists, bantu knots, twist-outs, braids, as well as wash and go’s.For my son, this is a staple. His hair is styled with this cream weekly. Throughout the week, I moisturize using the Hydrating Hair Butter.

Ingredients

Water, aloe vera juice, shea butter, avocado butter, coconut oil, horsetail extract, emulsifying wax, palm stearic acid, nettle extract, neem extract, fragrance, tinosan, potassium sorbate.

name: Hydrating Hair Butter~ 4 oz.
description:
A rich and intensely hydrating hair butter. This butter is smooth (not whipped) and lightweight. It melts in your hands and goes a long way. A little bit will leave your hair moisturized and feeling great. It also imparts a lot of shine to the hair. The Hydrating Hair Butter has been a staple in my styling routine. Pick a picture in my album from the past year and I can almost guarantee that this product was used at some point in the styling process. Available in two wonderful blends of essential oils.

Ingredients

Lemon/Ylang Ylang: Coconut oil, mango butter, kokum butter, shea butter, sweet almond oil, lemon and ylang ylang essential oils. Lavender/Jasmine: Coconut oil, mango butter, kokum butter, shea butter, sweet almond oil, lavender and jasmine essential oils.

name: Nurturing Treatment Oil
description:
Pre-order Now during the sale. Pre-orders will be available on October 1, 2011 I’ve used this product for all my oil needs, whether it is oil rinsing, pre-washing, conditioning, deep conditioning and sealing. I love that this oil does not leave a greasy film in the hair, or weigh it down. It also smells wonderful without any fragrance added! Directions: Pre-Shampooing: Apply a moderate amount to hair before shampooing to prevent over-drying. Deep Conditioning: Apply a small amount to your conditioner to increase its slip and detangling capabilities. Hot Oil Treatment: Apply to your damp hair and cover with a shower cap. Leave the oil on your hair for 15-20 minutes, rinse and condition or style as usual. Styler: Mix this oil with your styler, or use afterward to seal your ends or to add needed moisture to entire strands. Oil rinsing: Apply to your hair while in the shower, following your conditioner. Apply the oil and proceed to rinsing your hair with cool water, as usual.

Ingredients:

Sweet almond oil, apricot kernel oil, jojoba oil, avocado oil, grapeseed oil, essential oils of lavender and jasmine.

name: Hair and Scalp Serum
description:
Too many times, we don’t think of the health of our scalp and the benefits of a healthy scalp when it comes to hair growth and overall hair health. Well, I went to work on caring for our scalp and making sure that there is a healthy foundation to our hair care. This key product uses jojoba and castor oil as a base to bring the essential oils to your scalp. Directions: For continual care~ use this product 2-3 times a week (or more) on your scalp. You only need to apply a few drops to your scalp and massage the oil well into your skin. To recover from hair breakage~ Apply the product nightly and massage well into your scalp.

Ingredients:

Jojoba oil, castor oil, essential oils of peppermint, ylang ylang, rosemary, lemon, patchouli, frankincense and tangerine.

name: Conditioning Hair Treatment~ 8 oz.
description:
Conditioning Hair Treatment quenches the thirst and dryness out of natural hair. Say good bye to tangles! This conditioner is heavily concentrated with highly effective conditioning and moisturizing agents. To use: Apply a quarter size amount to clean, wet hair. This product is intended to be used while the hair is still wet. Apply and massage the conditioner into your hair and scalp, focusing on your ends. Cover your hair with a plastic cap for 15-20 minutes. You can keep the treatment in your hair longer or apply heat if desired. Rinse to moisturized hair and follow with your styling products.

Ingredients:

Water, cetyl alcohol, honey, behentrimonium methosulfate, glycerin, jojoba oil, avocado oil, stearyl alcohol, hemp seed oil, hibiscus extract, nettle extract, vitamin e, lavender essential oil, jasmine essential oil, tinosan, potassium sorbate.
